Package tk.artsakenos.ultrahttp.drupal

Class DrupalClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.artsakenos.ultrahttp.Client
      • tk.artsakenos.ultrahttp.drupal.DrupalClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrupalMapper
    public class DrupalClient
extends Client
    A DrupalClient with all the boilerplate. When you extend properly DrupalNode::toJsonNode() you can just call DrupalClient::edit(...) which will take care of everything.
    Version:
    2020.06
    Author:
    Andrea

        public DrupalNode editNode​(DrupalNode drupalNode)

        public <T extends DrupalNode> void editNode​(T drupalNode,
                                            Class<T> nodeClass,
                                            okhttp3.Callback callback)
        An asynchronous #editNode with a Callback. Useful, e.g., in Android
        Type Parameters:
        T - THe class of the DrupalNode
        Parameters:
        drupalNode - the DrupalNode
        nodeClass - The Class of the Node
